Lunarpine circled Grizzltron like a prizefighter sizing up his opponent his=
 claws drawn he throws a jab at his opponents chest.

Outside the cave Ice =
senses the fight and readies herself  for the winner. She knew how strong L=
unarpine was but against someone the size of a bear he'd have to out maneuv=
er  it with speed and finesse. 

                                          =
